positions.title: One on One Tutor
notes: Coached 18 students in a one-on-one format for a total of 270 hours.
Maintained full responsibility over one-on-one students, including progress monitoring, student and parent communication, and student performance data collection and analysis.
Developed student-specific program and curriculum structures to cater to each student’s specific ACT preparation needs.
One-one-one students who completed tutoring achieved a 5-point increase (on average)

positions.title: Academic Coach
notes: Managed a team of two assistant coaches and as many as 40 students simultaneously.
Trained and guided assistant coaches on their individual responsibilities and performance
Coached a total of 173 students, with over 10% of these students reaching a 34/36 on the ACT (99% percentile score).

positions.title: Assistant Coach
notes: Mentored a team of 20 students and encouraged an environment for academic success and growth

Alternated responsibility with another assistant coach on a weekly basis between entering my students’ statistics (test scores, hours, etc.) and monitoring the students’ progress towards memorizing quiz material.
